titles.title: In The Mighty Name Of Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In the mighty name of Jesus, When we pray before the throne, Many deadly foes are vanquished, Many victories are won.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mighty Name! Mighty Name! In that Name alone we win. Mighty Name! Mighty Name! Conquering Satan, death and sin.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When we plead the name of Jesus, Satan and his hosts must flee. Jesus! Jesus! Precious Jesus! In Thy name is victory.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And until that blessed hour, From my heart with purity I will call to Thee Lord Jesus For the joy that dwells in me{/lang-eng}
